data.name: FOSSCON India 2019
data.description: FOSSCON INDIA 2019, Home,GIT, Belagavi, a platform to showcase your skills in all aspects of technology. The projects done using any of the open source software can be showcased. grab the chance to be a part of the wonderful event.

relatedRecords.name: Software Freedom Day - 2k19
relatedRecords.description: Software Freedom Day 2017 is approaching, let’s tell people about it! Software Freedom Day (aka SFD) is a yearly event organised all around the world by open source enthusiasts.
